title: [Cleric Guild, Alchemy East]
description: Three narrow windows, placed halfway up the wall, provide the illumination for the polished granite-floored and walled room via three streams of moonlight.  A small niche in the corner is both the setting for a small altar and also the only decoration other than a dark wood workbench and assorted alchemic instruments.  The liquid sounds of a slow moving river carry in from outside through the windows, accompanied by a slight breeze rich with the aroma of wet earth and sweet smelling blossoms.

Three narrow windows, thin rectangles of light placed halfway up the wall, provide the illumination for the polished granite-floored and walled room.  A small niche in the corner is both the setting for a small altar and also the only decoration other than a dark wood workbench and assorted alchemic instruments.  The liquid sounds of a slow moving river carry in from outside through the windows, accompanied by a slight breeze rich with the aroma of wet earth and sweet smelling blossoms.
